title: So the N word isn't insta ban anymore?
body:
Just curious. Had a teemo troll our game hard a few hours ago. He called someone the n work. Correct spelling and everything. But I loaded his profile and he has played 4 games since that one. 

Still just slightly peeved at that game

It should be a no tolerance word, meaning you get an instant ban as soon as you type it. The system recognizes certain words like that and will ban you after your game.

> It should be a no tolerance word, meaning you get an instant ban as soon as you type it. The system recognizes certain words like that and will ban you after your game.

As far as I know, the system doesn't do a single thing if there is no report against the player. This is to allow situations like a group of people (like a group of friends) making jabs at each other, with no ill-will intended or taken, without getting banned when no one had a problem with their behavior in that game.

No. It has to be a problem to someone. If I'm in a game with 4 friends who are comfortable with that word, and I say it, I should be auto banned even though no one was offended and no one reported?  That's fucking disgusting bro lol Jesus Christ. That's like a whole new level of brainwashed by PC culture.

The ban system does nothing if there is no report to look at. This is done so it intervenes only on the basis of someone being offended and files an report, instead of just going around banning someone on its own; it's also to reduce its workload as it's easier to just tell players do reports instead of having the system monitor each and every single match there is and will be.

If reported with perfect spelling and all, then idk.

I was told by my previous team to kill myself, and not come out of fountain because they are better 4v5.  I reported after the game and have received no such message they were punished, where as I got one the other day for reporting someone for something much less toxic.

I hope that justice is served.
riot games dont give no fuck bout protectin us they just want ban everyone hurtin soft ppl feelings

Mute, report, move on.

It is ZT. He will get caught for using it, even if he skated by this time, but move on is just as important. Don't dwell on it. He'll get caught and banned if he does that stuff.
